---
title: "Exemplo de shiny"
format: html
server: shiny
---

```{r}
#| context: setup
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)

dados <- dados::dados_starwars
```

```{r}
#| panel: input
#| title: "Filtro"
#| layout-ncol: 3

shiny::sliderInput(
  "altura_max",
  "Altura mÃ¡xima",
  min = 0,
  max = 300,
  value = 200
)

shiny::sliderInput(
  "faixa_histograma",
  "Number of bins:",
  min = 0,
  max = 50,
  value = 30
)
```

```{r}
#| panel: center
plotOutput("distPlot")
```

```{r}
#| context: server

output$distPlot <- renderPlot({
  dados |> 
    filter(altura < input$altura_max) |> 
    ggplot(aes(x = altura)) + 
    geom_histogram(bins = input$faixa_histograma)
})
```
